original_text: A person who touches the unclean man must wash his clothes. He must also wash his body. He will be unclean until evening.
korean_text: 유출병이 있는 자의 몸에 접촉하는 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: A person who touches the unclean man
He must also wash his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그의 몸을 씻어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He will be unclean until evening
